label: Regular Speed
def_question: Is the playback forward at real-time speed without noticeable speed-up or slowdown?
alt_question: Does the scene play at a natural, unaltered speed?
Is the video not sped up or slowed down?
Does the movement appear to match real-world timing?
def_prompt: The playback is forward at real-time speed without noticeable speed-up or slowdown.
alt_prompt: A shot captured at standard playback speed.
A video showing motion at a natural, unmodified pace.
A scene where time progresses at a normal rate.
